I.name: Thousand Cuts
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Gwen's''' [[basic attack]]s {{tip|on-hit}}, the center of ''{{ai|Snip Snip!|Gwen}}'', and ''{{ai|Needlework|Gwen}}'' deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} equal to {{as|1% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.8}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health}}.

''Thousand Cuts'' is modified based on the target:
* {{tip|heal|Heals}} '''Gwen''' for 60% of {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and most modifiers.}} dealt against {{tip|champion|champions}}, capped at {{pp|10 to 25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|6.5}}% AP)}} per instance.
* Deals an additional {{as|{{pp|8 to 30}} '''bonus''' magic damage}} against {{tip|minions}} that are below {{as|40% of their '''maximum''' health}}.
* Deals a maximum of {{as|10 {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} magic damage|magic damage}} against {{tip|monsters}}.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Gwen's basic attacks on-hit, the center of Gwen's Snip Snip!, and Gwen's Needlework deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target: * Heals Gwen for 60% of post-mitigation damage dealt against champions, capped at 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 6.5% AP) per instance. * Deals an additional 8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage against minions that are below 40% of their maximum health. * Deals a maximum of 10 (+ 15% AP) magic damage against monsters.
I.notes: * The attacks do not deal the '''bonus''' damage against [[structures]].

Q.name: Snip Snip!
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Gwen's''' [[basic attack]]s [[on-hit]] generate a [[stack]] of ''Snippy'' for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Gwen''' snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing {{as|magic damage}} per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip deals {{ccs|{{as|true damage}}|true}} instead and applies ''{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen}}''.
If '''Gwen''' has any ''Snippy'' stacks, she consumes them to snip an additional time for each.
Q.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Gwen's basic attacks on-hit generate a stack of Snippy for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
Active: Gwen snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing magic damage per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip deals true damage / true">Unknown value: ccs / true damage / true instead and applies Gwen's Thousand Cuts.
If Gwen has any Snippy stacks, she consumes them to snip an additional time for each.
leveling:
{{st|Damage per Snip|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}} to {{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}}}% AP)}}|Center Damage per Snip|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}} to {{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}}}% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ {{#var:pd1}}% {{as|(+ {{#var:pd2}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}} {{st|Final Snip Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}} to {{#var:fs5}}}} {{as|(+ {{#var:fsr}}% AP)}}|Final Snip Center Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}} to {{#var:fs5}}}} {{as|(+ {{#var:fsr}}% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ {{#var:pd1}}% {{as|(+ {{#var:pd2}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}

{{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}+{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}} to {{#var:fs5}}+{{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}+{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}}}}% AP)}}|Minimum Center Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}+{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}} to {{#var:fs5}}+{{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}+{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa1}}}}% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:pd1}}+{{#var:pd1}}*{{#var:sa1}}}}% {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:pd2}}+{{#var:pd2}}*{{#var:sa1}}}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}} {{st|Maximum Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}+{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}} to {{#var:fs5}}+{{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}+{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}}}}% AP)}}|Maximum Center Damage|{{ap|{{#var:fs1}}+{{#var:fs1}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}} to {{#var:fs5}}+{{#var:fs5}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}}}} {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:fsr}}+{{#var:fsr}}*{{#var:ssm}}*{{#var:sa2}}}}% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:pd1}}+{{#var:pd1}}*{{#var:sa2}}}}% {{as|(+ {{ap|{{#var:pd2}}+{{#var:pd2}}*{{#var:sa2}}}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}
Q.notes:
* Subsequent basic attacks on-hit also refresh the duration of ''Snippy'' stacks.
* The amount of ''Snippy'' stacks '''Gwen''' has is indicated below her [[health bar]].
* The damage from {{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen}} is '''not''' converted to {{as|true damage}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} blocks only one snip.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
* The first snip happens at {{tt|{{fd|0.13}} seconds|Measured, should be 0.1 seconds rounded up to 0.132 seconds}}, the last one at the end of the cast time.
** Bonus snips from ''Snippy'' stacks each happen at {{fd|0.45}}, {{fd|0.4}}, {{fd|0.35}} and {{fd|0.23}} seconds into the cast time.

W.name: Hallowed Mist
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gwen''' summons the Hallowed Mist upon her current location, lasting for 5 seconds. ''Hallowed Mist'' can be recast after {{fd|0.5}} seconds, and does so automatically if '''Gwen''' attempts to leave the area.

While inside the mist, '''Gwen''' gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} and is {{tip|untargetable}} to all enemies (except {{tip|turret|turrets}} and {{tip|monsters}}) outside of the mist.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Gwen''' commands the mist to move to her current location.
'''''Gwen''' negates all attacks by {{tip|monsters}} outside of the mist.''
W.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist upon her current location, lasting for 5 seconds. Hallowed Mist can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically if Gwen attempts to leave the area.
While inside the mist, Gwen gains bonus armor and bonus magic resistance and is untargetable to all enemies (except turrets and monsters) outside of the mist.
Recast: Gwen commands the mist to move to her current location.
Gwen negates all attacks by monsters outside of the mist.
W.notes:
* ''Hallowed Mist's'' {{tip|untargetability}} does not apply to {{tip|monster|monsters}} nor {{tip|turret|turrets}}, meaning they are allowed to gain aggro against '''Gwen''' and attack her regardless of being in the mist or not.
** However, '''Gwen''' will not take damage from monsters that hit her and are outside of the mist.
* ''Hallowed Mist'' does not grant untargetability against enemy {{tip|pet|pets}} inside the zone even if their source is not.
* All {{tip|projectile|projectiles}} targeted at '''Gwen''' by enemy champions outside the mist are {{tip|homing projectile destruction|destroyed}} upon attempting to pass through the mist or being inside the mist.
** Targeted projectiles sourced by minions or monsters will not be destroyed and can still hit '''Gwen''' even if they are outside of the zone.
* If '''Gwen''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} out of the area, the mist will automatically move to the dash's destination instead of '''Gwen's''' location.
** The mist will stop moving immediately if the dash is interrupted.
* The recast will move the mist's center 75 units through '''Gwen's''' location at the time.
** If she is {{tip|dash|dashing}}, the mist will move 75 units through her dash destination instead.
* The mist will teleport to '''Gwen's''' location if she {{tip|blink|blinks}} a far distance.
* Enemy champions outside the mist are indicated with a broken sword.
* ''Hallowed Mist'' will indicate that '''''Gwen is Immune''''' whenever an effect attempts to hit '''Gwen'''.

E.name: Skip 'n Slash
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gwen''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} to the target location, and afterwards she gains {{as|10|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}} on her basic attacks, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|50 '''bonus''' attack range}} for 4 seconds.
'''Gwen's''' first basic attack within the duration refunds 50% of ''Skip 'n Slash's'' {{sti|cooldown}}.
''Skip 'n Slash'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Gwen's''' basic attack timer, and can be cast during any of '''Gwen's''' abilities, and vice versa.
''Skip 'n Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.''
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gwen dashes to the target location, and afterwards she gains 10 (+ 15% AP) bonus magic damage on-hit on her basic attacks, bonus attack speed and 50 bonus attack range for 4 seconds.
Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds 50% of Skip 'n Slash's cooldown.
Skip 'n Slash resets Gwen's basic attack timer, and can be cast during any of Gwen's abilities, and vice versa.
Skip 'n Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
E.notes:
* ''Skip 'n Slash'' has no minimum dash range.
* The basic attack reset is not considered one for {{ri|Hail of Blades}}.{{bug|2}}

R.name: Needlework
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Gwen''' can activate ''Needlework'' up to 3 times, launching needles in the target direction with each cast. Each needle deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slows}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds. For each individual target, needle hits beyond the first {{tip|slow}} by a reduced amount.

Within 6 seconds after the first cast, '''Gwen''' needs to hit a [[basic attack]], which has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}}, or ''{{ai|Snip Snip!|Gwen}}'' to unlock the second cast. After using the second cast, the duration is refreshed and she may repeat the aforementioned requirement to unlock the third cast. Each subsequent cast increases the number of needles launched by 2.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Gwen can activate Needlework up to 3 times, launching needles in the target direction with each cast. Each needle deals magic damage and slows them for 1.5 seconds. For each individual target, needle hits beyond the first slow by a reduced amount.
Within 6 seconds after the first cast, Gwen needs to hit a basic attack, which has an uncancellable windup, or Gwen's Snip Snip! to unlock the second cast. After using the second cast, the duration is refreshed and she may repeat the aforementioned requirement to unlock the third cast. Each subsequent cast increases the number of needles launched by 2.
First cast: Gwen launches one needle.
Second cast: Gwen launches three needles.
Third cast: Gwen launches five needles.
leveling:
{{st|Total Possible Damage|{{ap|30*9 to 80*9}} {{as|(+ 72% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 9% {{as|(+ {{fd|7.2}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}

{{st|First Cast Total Damage|{{ap|30 to 80}} {{as|(+ 8% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 1% {{as|(+ {{fd|0.8}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}

{{st|Second Cast Total Damage|{{ap|30*3 to 80*3}} {{as|(+ 24% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 3% {{as|(+ {{fd|2.4}}% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}

{{st|Third Cast Total Damage|{{ap|30*5 to 80*5}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}
{{ai|Thousand Cuts|Gwen|{{as|(+ 5% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} of the target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}}}
R.notes:
;Details
* '''Gwen''' can still move during ''Needlework's'' cast times.
* Dying during the cast time will prevent the remaining needles of the cast from being launched.
* The first cast's cast time is {{fd|0.25}} seconds, and the second and third's cast times are each {{fd|0.5}} seconds. '''Gwen''' launches the needles during the cast times.
** For the second cast, the first needle launches {{rutngt|0.25}} after the start of the cast, the second needle launches after {{rutngt|0.1}}, and the third needle launches {{rutngt|0.2}} after the first.
** For the third cast, the first needle launches {{rutngt|0.25}} after the start of the cast. Each additional needle launches {{rutngt|0.0625}} seconds after the previous one.
* The needles of each cast will fire based on '''Gwen's''' location at {{rutngt|0.25}} into each cast time (in case of the first cast, this is at the end of the cast time).
** The needles fire from 100 units ''behind'' the cast location.
** The width of all needle missiles decreases with their distance travelled, forming an approximately triangular missile hitbox.
** Needles of the same cast all travel the same line at a slight delay after one another. The visual origins are offset (by 70 and 110 units to either side from the center missile spawn location), but the actual hitting missiles all follow the central line.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} blocks only one needle.
* ''Needlework'' is placed on a {{fd|0.1}}-second cooldown when the cast time completes and when '''Gwen''' gains a recast (before gaining a recast via the attack, the recast remains sealed even while not on cooldown).
{{Effect at cast time end}}
